original_text: Then Asa took all the silver and the gold that were left in the treasures of the house of the Lord, and the treasures of the king's house, and delivered them into the hand of his servants: and king Asa sent them to Benhadad, the son of Tabrimon, the son of Hezion, king of Syria, that dwelt at Damascus, saying,
korean_text: 아사가 여호와의 성전 곳간과 왕궁 곳간에 남은 은금을 모두 가져다가 그 신하의 손에 넘겨 다메섹에 거주하고 있는 아람의 왕 헤시온의 손자 다브림몬의 아들 벤하닷에게 보내며 이르되

sentences.original_text: Then Asa took all the silver and gold
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 아사가 모든 은과 금을 가져가서

sentences.original_text: that were left in treasures of the house of the Lord
and treasures of the king's house
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 왕의 집 보고에 있는 것들을

sentences.original_text: and delivered them into the hand of his servants
and king Asa sent them to Benhadad
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 왕 아사가 그것들을 벤하닷에게 보냈으니
